LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.baby_crying.label: baby crying
LanguageData.CryingBaby.stages.baby_crying.descriptio: That shrill wailing sound is so irritating!
LanguageData.GigglingBaby.stages.baby_giggling.label: baby giggling
LanguageData.GigglingBaby.stages.baby_giggling.descri: A giggling baby just brings a smile to my face.
LanguageData.MyCryingBaby.stages.my_baby_is_crying.de: My baby is crying. I hope it stops soon.
LanguageData.MyGigglingBaby.stages.my_baby_giggling.d: My baby is the cutest in the anthrosphere!
